title.description: The text 'Student Brainstorm: Server Based' in the page title

instructions.value:
下のトピックを読んでから答えを書きなさい。
{0}　ボタンをクリックするとクラスメートの応答が表示されます。
instructions.description: The instructions for the brainstorm step

my_response.description: The text 'My Response' right above the textbox where the student types in their response

save.description: The text 'Save' on the button to save and post a brainstorm response

other_student_responses.description: The text 'Other Student Responses' that is displayed above the list of other students' responses

check_for_new_responses.value: 応答リストをリフレッシュする
check_for_new_responses.description: The text 'Check for New Responses' that is displayed on a button that triggers the loading of other students' responses

save_noContent.value: セーブするものがありません
save_noContent.description: Text to display when user tries to save an empty post or replay

post_reply.description: Text for button/link to add a new reply to a brainstorm post

noStarter.value: {0}にはスターターがありません。
noStarter.description: Text to display when user requests to display starter sentence but step does not have one set

showStarterSentence.value: スターターを表示する
showStarterSentence.description: Text for link to show the starter sentence for the step

save_fail.value: セーブ中にエラーが生じました。
save_fail.description: Error text to display when server fails to save user's post or reply

flag_inappropriate.value: このコメントは表示できません。
flag_inappropriate.description: Text to display when a comment has been removed

postedByLabel.description: Label text indicating user that posted a message
